channel.title: Rune06 - Bringing back 2006
channel.description:
Status: Developing Free to Play Team: Me & pk2play Contributors: Loveandpower Beta release (expected): July 15, 2011 Percent done: 15% Sorry guys! When Zak (Owner Nitro) got my account he deleted this thread I think. So I'm posting again. :) [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/Untitled-1%20copy.png[/img] Same rules as last time... No flaming, won't tolerate it... Blah blah blah... Our goal is to get as close to RuneScape 2006 as possible (we know we won't get it to 100%, at least not for a good long while). Do to what happened yesterday (June 24, 2011), it will be extremely rare if I let someone join the team if I let anyone join at all. So here's the information! We are aiming for Free to Play done first, then moving onto Pay to Play. Here's some things we have done:
~Lots of object actions. ~Great wood cutting base. ~About 50% toys done. ~Almost 100% Free to Play spawns. ~Almost all shops (only missing 2). ~Tutorial Island is about 20% done. ~Almost all free to play food (missing about 5ish?).
I know we have more than this but I forget xD What we are going to be adding either today or really soon:
~Pathfinding ~NPC clipping (gunna try to get it without any memory leak) ~More quests ~Finish off tutorial island ~Add free to play skills ~Better object actions
Some Media: [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/wc.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/toys.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/spawns.png[/img] Thanks for looking at our development, site will be coming soon! If we work really hard, we can probably get the beta up by July no problem.
